channel.title: CVE Feed for Artica PFMS -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Artica PFMS -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-24514|2024-09-27T21:57:03.260Z -- artica%20pfms -- pandora%20fms
item.description: Cross-site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Visual Console Module of Pandora FMS could be used to hijack admin users session cookie values, carry out phishing attacks, etc. This issue affects Pandora FMS v767 version and prior versions on all platforms.
